name: Exploring Borders (literally)
description:
This is game prototype was created during the Play20 Game Jam in 2020.

The Jam's theme was "Exploring Borders".

The game mechanics are literally exploring the borders of a level, in this case invisible walls known to every gamer, while collecting clues to reveale a border that still restricts people all around the world.

This prototype contains two proof of concept levels.
